contentList.content: Bolster
Bolster your allies against the dangers that lie ahead.

Hit point maximum increased by [1].

When you roll a 1 on an Attack Roll, Ability Check, or Saving Throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

You can see in the dark up to [2].
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in Deception, Intimidation, Performance, and Persuasion.
Has <LSTag Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in Deception, Intimidation, Performance, and Persuasion.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in Acrobatics, Sleight of Hand, and Stealth.
Has <LSTag Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in Acrobatics, Sleight of Hand, and Stealth.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in Arcana, History, Investigation, Nature, and Religion.
Has <LSTag Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in Arcana, History, Investigation, Nature, and Religion.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in Athletics.
Has <LSTag Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in Athletics.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in Animal Handling, Insight, Medicine, Perception, and Survival.
Has <LSTag Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in Animal Handling, Insight, Medicine, Perception, and Survival.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in all <LSTag Tooltip="Skill">Skills</LSTag> of a chosen <LSTag Tooltip="Abilities">Ability</LSTag>.
Abilities +0
Increase all of your abilities by 0, to a maximum of 30.
Abilities +1
Increase all of your abilities by 1, to a maximum of 30.
Abilities +2
Increase all of your abilities by 2, to a maximum of 30.
Abilities +3
Increase all of your abilities by 3, to a maximum of 30.

Increase all of your abilities by 4, to a maximum of 30.
Abilities +5
Increase all of your abilities by 5, to a maximum of 30.
Abilities +6
Increase all of your abilities by 6, to a maximum of 30.
Abilities +7
Increase all of your abilities by 7, to a maximum of 30.
Abilities +8
Increase all of your abilities by 8, to a maximum of 30.
Abilities +9
Increase all of your abilities by 9, to a maximum of 30.
Abilities +10
Increase all of your abilities by 10, to a maximum of 30.
Abilities +11
Increase all of your abilities by 11, to a maximum of 30.
Abilities +12
Increase all of your abilities by 12, to a maximum of 30.
Abilities +13
Increase all of your abilities by 13, to a maximum of 30.
Abilities +14
Increase all of your abilities by 14, to a maximum of 30.
Abilities +15
Increase all of your abilities by 15, to a maximum of 30.
Abilities +16
Increase all of your abilities by 16, to a maximum of 30.
Abilities +17
Increase all of your abilities by 17, to a maximum of 30.
Abilities Bonus
Increase all of your abilities, to a maximum of 30.
None
Decline any racial ability at this level.
Archer
You are proficient with all bows, and gain a +2 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">ranged weapon attacks</LSTag> and damage.
Light-Fingered
You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="SleightOfHand">Sleight of Hand</LSTag>.
Swordmaster
You are proficient with all swords, and gain a +2 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">melee weapon attacks</LSTag> and damage.
Battle Magic
After making a weapon or unarmed attack, you can cast a spell as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag>.
Cunning Actions

They'll never see you coming, until it's too late. As a bonus action, you can use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash_CunningAction">Cunning Action: Dash</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Hide_BonusAction">Cunning Action: Hide</LSTag>, or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Disengage_CunningAction">Cunning Action: Disengage</LSTag>.
<LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> increased by [1].
Misty Step
Surrounded by silver mist, you teleport to an unoccupied space you can see.
Elven Resilience
You shrug off attacks, taking 2 less damage from all sources.
Volley
Strike multiple foes at once. You gain <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Volley">Volley</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Whirlwind">Whirlwind</LSTag>
Wilderness Explorer
You have become an expert at moving through the wilderness. <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag> no longer slows you down, and you can't slip on grease or ice.
Racial Features
Select a racial feature.
